About Me

Being involved into various open-source projects, I developed a strong passion for documentation and developer experience (DX).
For me (technical) documentation is more than “just” explaining how things are working.
Good documentation is part of a great developer and user experience.

Let’s put the fun back into reading documentation and create the best DX possible for more efficiently and happiness!

Experiences

Technical Documentation Specialist

January 2023 - Present
Traefik Labs
  • Developing and introducing new documentation processes, guidelines, and tooling.
  • Creating new content and documentation structure for various projects to enhance the user experience based on good practices and user research.
  • Introducing templates for unifying documentation and creating an improved UX.
  • Migrating documentation from MkDocs to Docusaurus, introducing modern and good documentation practices and content guidelines.
  • Implementing custom Docusaurus components to enhance the user experience.
  • Introducing modern documentation quality checks (local and with CI).
  • Creating custom QA rules and configurations for docs-like-code tools to set a baseline and enhance the quality of various documentation projects.
  • Introducing dashboards and metrics (Grafana and Prometheus) for detailed documentation monitoring (PRs, amount of pages, amount of words per page, amount of lines per page and such).
  • Integrating AI based search into documentation.
  • Integrating custom search and search scraper with Typesense.

DX (Developer Experience) Lead

Create the best DX possible for more efficiently and happiness.

OSS Contributions

In my free time, I contribute to various open-source projects and communities.

Plone - Plone is an open-source content management system (CMS).
Traefik - Traefik is an open-source Edge Router that makes publishing your services a fun and easy experience.
TestTheDocs - Incubator - A small community around docs-as-code and documentation tooling.
Write the Docs - A global community of people who care about documentation.
